name: com.distantlands.lumen
description:
Bring your scenes to life with glowing flares, sweeping god rays, and dynamic lighting that feels real, looks magical, and runs fast. Lumen 2 is a complete stylized lighting toolkit built for performance, beauty, and ease of use, designed for artists and developers who want the look of volumetrics without the overhead.

Inspired by lighting tricks seen in games like Genshin Impact, Overland, Amnesia: The Dark Descent, and Alto's Adventure, Lumen 2 gives you access to powerful mesh-based lighting systems that capture the mood and direction of volumetric lighting with a fraction of the cost. Whether you're developing a cozy platformer, a mysterious horror title, or a colorful RPG, Lumen makes your lighting stand out from the competition.
